DOC.brief_title: Family Networks Project Study One : An Efficacy Study Stepping Stones Triple P Children Under Age Two
DOC.detailed_description: This study initial efficacy trial SSTP parent child age 2 . The target population consist 50 family young child age 11-23 month developmental disability eligible receive IDEA Part C ( Individuals Disabilities Education Act Part C ) service one region South Carolina . Families randomly assign one two condition ( 1 ) IDEA Part C service usual ( 2 ) IDEA Part C service plus SSTP . Project goal strengthen parent competence , enhance parent confidence , strengthen child social , emotional behavioral functioning . Ultimately , result reduce likelihood child maltreatment
